alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:56PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong outflow produced by a thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern El Paso and northeastern Pueblo Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 555 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong outflow produced by a thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Hanover, or 20 miles northeast of Pueblo Airport, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern El Paso and northeastern Pueblo Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
